DOC.brief_summary: The study aim compare effectivity dexamethasone 8 mg morphine 2 mg adjuvant epidural bupivacaine 0,125 % 12,5mg post-operative analgesia low extremity .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Dexamethasone Morphine Adjuvant Bupivacaine Post-operative Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Approval Ethical Committee Faculty Medicine University Indonesia acquire prior conduct study . Subjects give informed consent enrol study randomize two group . Intravenous ( IV ) cannula Ringer Lactate fluid , non-invasive blood pressure monitor , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) pulse-oxymetry set subject operation room . Epidural catheter insert ( 4 cm depth inside epidural space ) 1,5-2 mg IV midazolam 50 mcg IV fentanyl premedication . The catheter insertion confirm vacuum aspiration negative test-dose . General anesthesia induction do fentanyl 2 mcg/kg , propofol 2 mg/kg , atracurium 0,5 mg/kg . Maintenance do sevoflurane 2vol % , fentanyl atracurium . Surgery start without intraoperative epidural regimen . Surgery duration , blood pressure , heart rate , respiratory rate , oxygen saturation pulse oximetry ( SpO2 ) record . For post-operative analgesia , subject receive paracetamol 1 gr IV intermittent epidural analgesia regimen 10 cc syringe : Group 1 receive Bupivacaine 0,125 % 12,5 mg combine dexamethasone 8 mg plus 0,9 % sodium chloride ( NaCl ) volume 10 cc ; Group 2 receive Bupivacaine 0,125 % 12,5 mg combine morphine 2 mg plus 0,9 % NaCl volume 10 cc . The injection give anesthesiology resident without know syringe 's content . Patient Controlled Analgesia ( PCA ) morphine give recovery room . Data record blood pressure , heart rate , respiratory rate , oxygen saturation , visual analog scale , side effect , time first additional analgesia need subject , opioid requirement within 24 hour post-operation . Data analyze use Statistical Package Social Sciences ( SPSS ) software , numerical data use unpaired T-test Mann-Whitney-U test , categorical data use Chi-square Fisher Exact Test . Data normality test Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . Significant value p < 0.05 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 1860 year old American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status III body mass index ( BMI ) 18,525 kg/m2 plan undergo low extremity surgery Subjects explain study , agree enroll sign informed consent form Subjects history bupivacaine allergy Subjects history morphine allergy Subjects history urine retention Subjects history gait disturbance use prosthetic , Subjects history peptic ulcer Subjects history long term use corticosteroid Subjects contraindication epidural anesthesia Subjects reject participate study . Drop criterion : Subjects epidural anesthesia complication ( e.g . shock , anaphylactic reaction , seizure , severe respiratory disturbance ) Subjects failed epidural anesthesia .
